nfts.description: The cat is a domestic species of small carnivorous mammal. ... It is the family Felidae.
nfts.name: CAT

nfts.description: Horses are strong, intelligent, and social animals that live together in herds in the wild.
nfts.name: Horse

nfts.description: Owls has a large, broad head, binocular vision, binaural hearing, sharp talons, and feathers adapted for silent flight
nfts.name: Owl
